",["$r","p",null,{"children":["We’d like to give special thanks to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/tomocchino","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Tom Occhino"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/wolffiex","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Adam Wolff"}]," for their guidance and support over the years.
